991630.name: Metal Fury 3000
991630.description:
Metal Fury 3000 is set in a universe you've never seen before, full of environments, worlds to explore, over the top characters, ancient mysteries, terrifying evils, dinosaurs, dark magics, inquisitors and a totally sexy kickass heroine.

Metal Fury 3000 will mix furious shootings, brutal fights, awesome pixel art, real physics, destructible environments, dismembering enemies, a lot of secrets to find, absurdly devastating weapons to use, an amazing Heavy Metal soundtrack (that will split your eardrums) and much more.
991630.supported_languages:
英语*, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
